p: Recent worldwide epidemics of respiratory infections due to HAdV have resulted in renewed interest in this virus. The increase in cases of HAdV infection has also been reported in Asia. These include outbreaks due to established types such as HAdV type 7 (HAdV7), which have been reported in the community and in military and police camps between 2011 and 2013, in Taiwan, Singapore, China and Malaysia. [ 5â€“ 9] There have also been more recently emerging types such as HAdV55, described in China.[ 10]
